subject: We've got your myHermes International parcel
description_text: We’ve got your parcel We’ll let you know when it's out for delivery. Your myHermes International parcel is on its way to your local depot. We’ll send you an estimated delivery time within 48 hours. Track your parcel Delivery options Find out which of these options are available for your parcel. ParcelShop Free collection from a secure local shop, supermarket or Post Office. Locker Free collection from a secure local parcel locker at a time that suits you. Safe place Choose a safe place at your address for us to leave your parcel. Neighbour Choose a trusted neighbour to receive your parcel. View your delivery options No safe place at your address? Have your parcel delivered to a local ParcelShop free of charge. It’ll be held securely for up to 10 days, collect when it suits you. Download the Evri app Track this parcel more quickly and easily using our improved app. Tracking number H0011C0011890786 We sent you this email because myHermes International asked us to deliver a parcel to you. We haven't signed you up to a mailing list, and we'll only use your email address to contact you about this parcel. Evri Limited. Registered in England and Wales No. 03900782 Registered office: Capitol House, 1 Capitol Close, Morley, Leeds, LS27 0WH
